## Why Letters

Taiwan's highest denomination bank note  (1000 NTD) features four children studying a globe.
According to Wikipedia, they're referred to as the [小朋友](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fifth_series_of_the_new_Taiwan_dollar_banknote),
or little ones (literally, "little friends"). 


> Pipelines matter.
